item.title: Google Academy for Ads achievements
item.description: Achievements earned in Google Academy for Ads: Google Web Designer Basics certificate (passed on 9th October 2017) DoubleClick Dynamic Creative Basics certificate (passed on 6th November 2017)

item.title: Website improvements
item.description: A lot of hard work has been done under the hood to improve this website: automation with Gulp pipeline for minify and publication off-line support usings Workbox Service Worker secure thanks to DNSSEC support, Let’s Encrypt certificate, HTTP/2 support and HTTP Strict Transport Security technology (via CloudFlare)

item.title: Kubernetes contributions
item.description: I’ve been started my contribution to Kubernetes project (Production-Grade Container Orchestration). My Italian translation is part of the release 1.8 (details on pull request).

item.title: about
item.description: I’ve been 10 years in IT sector with technical background and service in mind. My strength are: GNU/Linux, Cloud Computing and Internet of Things. I like to explore the newest technology innovations like Deep Learning and BigData.

item.title: WebFundamentals contributions
item.description: In these few months I’ve been contributing to Google WebFundamentals project as contributor and Italian translator. More about my pull requests. I’m also on the contributors page.

item.title: New site
item.description: My previous web page design was too outdated so I want to start with newest technology. Welcome to my brand new website powered by Hugo!
